json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="activeCommitBatches">
<prop type="array" name="controlPlaneAcls">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="fabricLocks">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="featureFlags">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="l2IsolationDomains">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="l3IsolationDomains">
<prop type="array" name="exportRouteTargets">
<prop type="array" name="importRouteTargets">
<prop type="array" name="exportIpv4RouteTargets">
<prop type="array" name="exportIpv6RouteTargets">
<prop type="array" name="importIpv4RouteTargets">
<prop type="array" name="importIpv6RouteTargets">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="racks">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="routerIds">
<prop type="array" name="trustedIpPrefixes">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="uniqueRds">

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.controlPlaneAcls" options="control-plane-acls" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@VpnConfigurationProperties_create.optionBProperties.exportRouteTargets" options="export-route-targets">
<arg type="array" var="@VpnConfigurationProperties_create.optionBProperties.importRouteTargets" options="import-route-targets">
<arg type="array" var="@VpnConfigurationProperties_create.optionBProperties.routeTargets.exportIpv4RouteTargets" options="export-ipv4-route-targets">
<arg type="array" var="@VpnConfigurationProperties_create.optionBProperties.routeTargets.exportIpv6RouteTargets" options="export-ipv6-route-targets">
<arg type="array" var="@VpnConfigurationProperties_create.optionBProperties.routeTargets.importIpv4RouteTargets" options="import-ipv4-route-targets">
<arg type="array" var="@VpnConfigurationProperties_create.optionBProperties.routeTargets.importIpv6RouteTargets" options="import-ipv6-route-targets">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.trustedIpPrefixes" options="trusted-ip-prefixes" group="Properties">

help.short: The geo-location where the resource lives

json.schema:
<userAssigned action="create" type="array" name="userAssigned" arg="$resource.identity.userAssigned">
<prop type="array" name="controlPlaneAcls" arg="$resource.properties.controlPlaneAcls">
<prop type="array" name="exportRouteTargets" arg="@VpnConfigurationProperties_create.optionBProperties.exportRouteTargets">
<prop type="array" name="importRouteTargets" arg="@VpnConfigurationProperties_create.optionBProperties.importRouteTargets">
<prop type="array" name="exportIpv4RouteTargets" arg="@VpnConfigurationProperties_create.optionBProperties.routeTargets.exportIpv4RouteTargets">
<prop type="array" name="exportIpv6RouteTargets" arg="@VpnConfigurationProperties_create.optionBProperties.routeTargets.exportIpv6RouteTargets">
<prop type="array" name="importIpv4RouteTargets" arg="@VpnConfigurationProperties_create.optionBProperties.routeTargets.importIpv4RouteTargets">
<prop type="array" name="importIpv6RouteTargets" arg="@VpnConfigurationProperties_create.optionBProperties.routeTargets.importIpv6RouteTargets">
<prop type="array" name="trustedIpPrefixes" arg="$resource.properties.trustedIpPrefixes">

<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="activeCommitBatches">
<prop type="array" name="controlPlaneAcls">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="fabricLocks">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="featureFlags">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="l2IsolationDomains">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="l3IsolationDomains">
<prop type="array" name="exportRouteTargets">
<prop type="array" name="importRouteTargets">
<prop type="array" name="exportIpv4RouteTargets">
<prop type="array" name="exportIpv6RouteTargets">
<prop type="array" name="importIpv4RouteTargets">
<prop type="array" name="importIpv6RouteTargets">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="racks">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="routerIds">
<prop type="array" name="trustedIpPrefixes">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="uniqueRds">

command.name: update
command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$properties.properties.controlPlaneAcls" options="control-plane-acls" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@VpnConfigurationPatchableProperties_update.optionBProperties.exportRouteTargets" options="export-route-targets">
<arg type="array" var="@VpnConfigurationPatchableProperties_update.optionBProperties.importRouteTargets" options="import-route-targets">

<arg type="array" var="@VpnConfigurationPatchableProperties_update.optionBProperties.routeTargets.importIpv6RouteTargets" options="import-ipv6-route-targets">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$properties.properties.trustedIpPrefixes" options="trusted-ip-prefixes" group="Properties">
